title: The Dissolving Distance

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of the pool's perfect mirror surface, Evan and Architect at opposite edges, their reflections meeting in the center
Medium shot as both step in simultaneously, ripples from their entry creating interference patterns
Close on the water where their forms blend, neither fully separate nor fully merged
panel_structure.focus: The terror and beauty of connection

key_themes: fear of losing self in other
courage to remain present despite ego death
transformation_notes: The boundary dissolution pool literalizes the fear and desire of deep connection. The water makes visible what happens when we truly let someone in.
dialogue_rhythm: Breathless, simultaneous, finishing each other's thoughts
